subject: CNN Alerts: bush
body:
CNN Alerts: bush






 



Alert Name: bush
UK minister rejects 'war on terror' phrase

04/16/07 04:54 AM, EDT
A British minister aspiring to higher office later this year will take aim at key elements of the Bush administration's policy on Monday, dismissing its phrase "war on terror" as only likely to encourage terrorists.
FULL STORY
